data.title: Nancy Carell Celebrity News and Gossip
data.text:
Steve and Nancy Carell are having a fun family outing!

The 61-year-old and 57-year-old The Office alums and couple took photos alongside kids Annie, 22, and Johnny, 19 at the F1 Grand Prix of the Netherlands on Sunday (August 27) in Zandvoort, Netherlands.

The family posed for a photo with the car of Max Verstappen of the Netherlands and Oracle Red Bull Racing on the grid prior to the race.

Keep reading to find out more…More Here! »

The stars are stepping out for the latest premiere at the 2023 Cannes Film Festival!

Scarlett Johansson and Tom Hanks were joined their respected spouses Colin Jost and Rita Wilson at the premiere of their new movie Asteroid City on Tuesday (May 23) held at the Palais des Festivals in Cannes, France.

Here’s the movie’s synopsis: The itinerary of a Junior Stargazer/Space Cadet convention — organized to bring together students and parents from across the country for fellowship and scholarly competition — is spectacularly disrupted by world-changing events.

Directed by Wes Anderson, Asteroid City will be released in select theaters on Friday, June 16th and nationwide on Friday, June 23rd. Watch the trailer here!

Head to the gallery to see over 80 photos from the Cannes premiere of Asteroid City…More Here! »

Kim Kardashian is joining boyfriend Pete Davidson at a very special event!

The 41-year-old reality star and the 28-year-old Saturday Night Live cast member made their first public appearance together at the 2022 Mark Twain Prize for American Humor held at The Kennedy Center on Sunday evening (April 24) in Washington, DC.

PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Kim Kardashian

Other stars in attendance included Steve Carell and wife Nancy, Jimmy Kimmel and wife Molly McNearney, The Office actor Ed Helms, Insecure stars Yvonne Orji and Chinedu Unaka, and comedian Samantha Bee.

Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi and husband Paul Pelosi along with Secretary of Transportation Pete Buttigieg and husband Chasten Buttigieg were also in at the event.

During the event, Bruce Springsteen took to the stage for a performance.

Jon Stewart is being honored as this year’s recipient of the Mark Twain Prize For American Humor. He was supported at the event by wife Tracey McShane and their kids Nathan, 17, and Maggie, 16.

In a recent interview, Kim revealed her favorite thing about dating Pete.

Click through the gallery inside for 20+ pictures of the stars at the event…More Here! »

Steve Carell and his Welcome to Marwen co-stars step out for the premiere!

The 56-year-old The Office star attended the event held at ArcLight on Monday (December 10) in Hollywood.

He was joined by his co-stars Diane Kruger, Gwendoline Christie, Leslie Zemeckis, Leslie Mann, Janelle Monae, Merritt Wever, Stefanie von Pfetten, Neil Jackson, Nikolai Witschl, Patrick Roccas, and director Robert Zemeckis.

Also there to show their support were Steve‘s wife Nancy Carell, Leslie M.‘s husband Judd Apatow and their kids Iris and Maude, as well as Christopher Lloyd.

In Welcome to Marwen, a victim of a brutal attack finds a unique and beautiful therapeutic outlet to help him through his recovery process.

Watch the trailer here, and don’t miss it when it hits theaters on December 21!

FYI: Diane is wearing Ralph & Russo couture with Gianvito Rossi shoes and Anna Sheffield earrings. Janelle is wearing a Wolk Morais outfit, Chloe Gosselin boots, a Cushnie clutch, Atelier Swarovski earrings, and a Stephen Webster ring. Leslie M. is wearing Zac Posen with Irene Neuwirth jewelry. Gwendoline is wearing Miu Miu.

35+ pictures inside of Steve Carell and more at the premiere… More Here! »

Timothee Chalamet and Steve Carell are bringing Beautiful Boy to LA!

The co-stars hit the red carpet at the premiere on Monday night (October 8) at Samuel Goldwyn Theater in Beverly Hills, Calif.

PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Timothee Chalamet

They were also joined by their cast mates Amy Ryan, Jack Dylan Grazer, Maura Tierney and Kaitlyn Dever.

Other cast attendees included Christian Convery, Stefanie Scott, Julian Works and Ricky Low.

Steve was also joined by his wife Nancy and their children John and Elisabeth.

Beautiful Boy is based on the best-selling pair of memoirs from father and son David and Nic Sheff chronicling their heartbreaking and inspiring experience of survival, relapse, and recovery in a family coping with addiction over many years.

The film hits theaters on October 12th.

FYI: Timothee is wearing Louis Vuitton. Kaitlyn is wearing a Valentino dress, Giuseppe Zanotti shoes and Jennifer Meyer jewelry. Amy is wearing Zac Posen with Sophia Webster shoes, Neil Lane jewels, and Michael Kors clutch.

Steve Carell and Willem Dafoe are taking a stand on the red carpet at the 2018 Golden Globe Awards held at the Beverly Hilton Hotel on Sunday (January 7) in Beverly Hills, Calif.

PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Steve Carell

The two are both nominated for awards this evening: Steve for Best Actor in a Motion Picture – Musical or Comedy for Battle of the Sexes and Willem for Best Supporting Actor in a Motion Picture – Musical or Comedy for The Florida Project.

The actors both wore black, and Steve wore a Time’s Up pin, in solidarity with the movement which aims to protest gender inequality, power abuse and harassment.

Steve was joined by his wife, Nancy Carell, and Willem was joined by his wife, Giada Colagrande.

FYI: Steve is wearing a Tom Ford tuxedo, Oliver Peoples glasses, and a Chopard watch and cuff links. Willem and Giada are both wearing Prada. Nancy is carrying a Tyler Ellis bag.

Tune in for the Golden Globes, hosted by Seth Meyers, at 8pm EST/5pm PST on NBC.

Zoey Deutch flashes a big smile alongside her Set It Up co-star Glen Powell while attending the premiere of Amazon’s latest film Last Flag Flying held at the DGA Theater on Thursday (November 1) in Los Angeles.

The 22-year-old actress and the 29-year-old actor stepped out to support the stars of the flick Steve Carell, who was accompanied by his wife Nancy, Laurence Fishburne, J. Quinton Johnson, Deanna Reed-Foster, Cicely Tyson, producer Ginger Sledge, and director-writer Richard Linklater.

Also in attendance to show his support was Blake Jenner.

Last Flag Flying (Synopsis): Thirty years after they served together in Vietnam, a former Navy Corpsman Larry “Doc” Shepherd re-unites with his old buddies, former Marines Sal Nealon and Reverend Richard Mueller, to bury his son, a young Marine killed in the Iraq War.

FYI: Zoey, Glen and Blake were all in Linklater‘s movie Everybody Wants Some.

‘Last Flag Flying’ – Official US Trailer
